Renewable Fuel Standard (RFS) Expansion:The Biden administration raised biofuel blending mandates, boosting soybean oil consumption for biodiesel. Soybean oil used for biofuels jumped from 8.5 billion lbs (2020) to 11.2 billion lbs (2022)

Renewable Fuel Standard (RFS) Expansion:The Biden administration raised biofuel blending mandates, boosting soybean oil consumption for biodiesel. Soybean oil used for biofuels jumped from 8.5 billion lbs (2020) to 11.2 billion lbs (2022)

tooltip.signal: datum.event ? {'Year': datum.year,'Category': datum.category,'Value': datum.food_value,'Event': datum.event} : {'Year': datum.year,'Category': datum.category,'Value': datum.food_value}
